item.title: 0.9 Repeater
item.description: Today I learned something a bit weird in mathematics, which I find quiet funny. Here it is: Write 0.9 repeater (0.999…) in the form of a fraction This can be done using an equation, have a look: n = 0.999... 10n = 9.999... 10n - n = 9 9n = 9 n = 1 So, 0.9 repeater is equal to 1. When I saw this, I thought I made a mistake somewhere, but I didn’t, and here’s how I “explain” it (to myself at least).
